etymons.meaning: to block up; to shut in, enclose; to hinder, impede; 571

Preterit.turoyo: ono səġli aq qayse lu saṯwo yaʕni qṭiʕili maḥtili ʕal ḥḏoḏe aw bi ṣira AA
translations: I organized pieces of wood for the winter, that is, I cut them, put them on each other or in a row

tokens.value: ono səġli aq qayse lu saṯwo
maḥtili ʕal ḥḏoḏe aw bi ṣira
'I organized pieces of wood for the winter, that is, I cut them, put them on each other or in a row'

Preterit.text: ono səġli aq qayse lu saṯwo, yaʕni qṭiʕili, maḥtili ʕal ḥḏoḏe aw bi ṣira 'I organized pieces of wood for the winter, that is, I cut them, put them on each other or in a row' (AA)

Infectum - wa.turoyo: … ḥǝmyoni u aḥuno Ṣaliba sayġiwa i goro d ʕito. 2018_07_08_au_003_NE_1F
translations: My father in-law and brother Saliba were making a fence on the church roof.

tokens.value: … ḥǝmyoni u aḥuno Ṣaliba sayġiwa i goro d ʕito.
‘My father in-law and brother Saliba were making a fence on the church roof.’

Infectum - wa.text: … ḥǝmyoni u aḥuno Ṣaliba sayġiwa i goro d ʕito. ‘My father in-law and brother Saliba were making a fence on the church roof.’ 2018_07_08_au_003_NE_1F; 25:29
